wikitext.*:
[[Image:adc.jpg|frame]] '''ADC Art & Books''' is a British dealer in books, specialising in the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and Middle-earth inspired art works. Under the name ''ADC Publications Ltd'', they also publish books and other media related to Tolkien and his legendarium. ADC Art & Books is agent for the following Tolkien-inspired artists: [[Ted Nasmith]], [[Ruth Lacon]], [[Jef Murray]] and [[Peter Pracownik]]. ==Publications== *[[2005]]: ''[[The Art of Ruth Lacon]]'' *[[2007]]: ''[[The Hidden Door|The Hidden Door: Songs in the Key of Enchantment]]'' (cd) *[[2009]]: ''[[Black & White Ogre Country|Black & White Ogre Country: The Lost Tales of Hilary Tolkien]]'' *[[2009]]: ''[[The Epic Realm of Tolkien]]'' *(Cancelled): ''[[Wheelbarrows at Dawn|Wheelbarrows at Dawn: Memories of Hilary Tolkien]]'' ==Collectibles== Furthermore, ADC Art and Books has manufactored a framed giclee of the battle between [[Éowyn]] and the [[Witch-king]]: {| class="TGtable" style="width:80%;text-align:center;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;" |- !style="width:150px;"|Image !style="width:200px;"|Name !style="width:80px;"|Artist(s) !style="width:80px;"|Product Type !style="width:150px;"|Product Size !style="width:150px;"|Weight !style="width:100px;"|Note(s) |- |[[File:Ted Nasmith - Éowyn and the Nazgûl.jpg|200px]] |Eowyn and the Nazgul
